columns.name: lens_alias
columns.description: The alias of the lens. For Amazon Web Services official lenses, this is either the lens alias, such as serverless, or the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-east-1:123456789012:lens/my-lens. Each lens is identified by its LensSummary$LensAlias.

columns.name: workload_id
columns.description: The ID assigned to the workload.

columns.name: milestone_number
columns.description: The milestone number. A workload can have a maximum of 100 milestones.

columns.name: base64_string
columns.description: The Base64-encoded string representation of a lens review report. This data can be used to create a PDF file.
